attributes.action: AMEND VACCINATION TECHNIQUES TO INCLUDE PRECAUTIONARY ASPIRATION
attributes.additional_details:
This will reduce the risk of thrombosis, Thrombocytopenia 
 and Myopericarditis.
Many countries have now chosen not to follow the WHO guidelines and have taken up vaccinating using aspiration such as Denmark, Germany, China, Taiwan and Thailand.
attributes.background: I would like the government to change the vaccine administration guidelines to include precautionary aspiration, prior to administering the vaccine.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is directly responsible for.

Procedural and clinical decisions about public health guidance on immunisation are an operational matter for Public Health England, not the Government or House of Commons.

As a result the Government or House of Commons is not directly responsible for the action you have requested.
